description.@en: I have learned to speak with the spirits of the other world—all it takes is a little patience and bravery.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You can use any Fellowship-based Skill to communicate with Supernatural threats using a spirit board. Randomly determine three Common Spells you learn as free Unique Abilities from the Common Spells Listings table. Finally, you can Risk Backlash and Unfetter your Spells (covered in Article 7: Combat Encounters and Article 9: Hexenmeister’s Almanack).
